title: 【K書中心113年寒假開放時間&置物櫃清理公告】K Book Center 2024 Winter Break Opening Hours & Locker Clearance Notice
author: 游守正
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 游守正 - cecil@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6594
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【K書中心113年寒假開放時間&置物櫃清理公告】K Book Center 2024 Winter Break Opening Hours & Locker Clearance Notice
日期： Fri, 12 Jan 2024 09:56:37 +0800

K書中心A館寒假開放日期與時間
開放日期：113年01月15日(一)至113年02月02日(五)
開放時間：週一至週五，早上09:30至晚間21:30

K書中心B館寒假不開放！

**A、B兩館置物櫃將於1/15中午過後陸續清空，請同學記得1/12(五)離校前來將東西帶走！！
否則清理後若無法找回，本中心恕不負責！！！

敬祝 寒假愉快

教學卓越中心 敬啟

Building A：
Opening Dates: January 15, 2024 (Monday) to February 2, 2024 (Friday)
Opening Hours: Monday to Friday, 09:30 AM to 09:30 PM

Building B：Closed during the winter break!

Important Notice:
Storage compartments in both Building A and Building B, will be cleared starting from noon on January 15, 2024. Students are urged to retrieve their belongings before leaving campus on January 12, 2024 (Friday)!!
Failure to do so may result in the loss of items, and the center will not assume responsibility for any belongings left behind after the clearance.

Wishing you a joyful winter break.

Best regards,
Teaching Excellence Center
